content:
Welcome to Gator Talk a collaborative CalState podcast that brings city and statewide perspectives to SF State news PERIOD New cohost Chris Ramirez breaks down your campusrelated questions from vaccine requirements to when the sauna in the Mashouf Wellness Center will be back in business PERIOD This week SF State saw half of its student body back in person for classes  the first time since the Spring  semester PERIOD Chris sat down with SF State President Lynn Mahoney and AVP for Research Michael Scott to ask your pressing questions about campus reopening PERIOD Check out the story here at Gator Talk PERIOD

The Student News Site of San Francisco State University
